name: San Francisco Veteran's Affairs (VA) Downtown Clinic
description: The San Francisco VA Downtown Clinic is an outpatient clinic that offers Veterans access to primary care, specialty health services, and other VA and non-VA benefits. If you're a Veteran in crisis or concerned about one, call the Veterans Crisis Line at 988 and select "1". This service is private, free, and available 24/7.
